titleInfo.title: Journey and Steve Miller at Colonial Life Arena

mods.abstract: Two color window card (purple and split fountain, purple to yellow, on white) announcing Journey and the Steve Miller Band with Tower of Power at the Colonial Life Arena on March 11. Poster features geometric woodcuts.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
